mapper.select: SELECT tc.clue_id, tc.name, tch.`channel_name`, tc.`phone`, tc.`status`, tc.`create_time`, tc.`create_by`, tc.next_time, ta.`user_name` AS `owner` FROM tienchin_clue tc LEFT JOIN tienchin_channel tch ON tc.channel_id = tch.`channel_id` LEFT JOIN tienchin_assignment ta ON ta.`assign_id` = tc.`clue_id` AND ta.`latest`=TRUE
